doc.after: Climate is influenced by the temperatures of the surface waters and water currents as well as winds Because of the ocean s great capacity to store and release heat maritime climates are more moderate and have less extreme seasonal variations than inland climates Precipitation can be approximated from coastal weather data and air temperature from water temperatures
